Plots for Figure 1

::: {.callout-note}
## Notes

* Use Geuvadis dataset
* Plot cluster and gene level
* Use all protein coding transcripts, instead fo only APPRIS transcripts

:::












## Correlation between cluster level unproductive splicing vs best productive intron length











Correlation test of cluster level unprodctive splicing vs. most used productive intron length


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Spearman's rank correlation rho

data:  up_plot_dt$intron_len and up_plot_dt$ratio
S = 9.9617e+11, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true rho is not equal to 0
sample estimates:
     rho 
0.161058 
```


:::
:::





Intron length takes the best productive intron of a cluster.


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![Correlation of cluster unproductive reads vs. length most used productive intron](plot-fig1-cluster-unprod-vs-pr-intron-length.svg){#fig-cluster-unprod-vs-pr-intron-length width=80%}
:::
:::






## Correlation between gene level unproductive splicing vs gene expression







::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Spearman's rank correlation rho

data:  up_plot_dt.gene$rpkm and up_plot_dt.gene$ratio
S = 2.1375e+11, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true rho is not equal to 0
sample estimates:
       rho 
-0.5710244 
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![Correlation of unproductive splicing vs. gene expression level](plot-fig1-gene-unprod-vs-rpkm.svg){#fig-gene-unprod-vs-rpkm width=80%}
:::
:::
